text: Pisonia wagneriana, the pāpala kēpau or Kauai catchbirdtree, is a species of flowering tree in the Bougainvillea family, Nyctaginaceae, that is endemic to Kauai in the Hawaiian Islands. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Trees of Hawaii wagneriana Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pisonia wagneriana
